channel.title: News on Andrea Mauri
channel.description: Recent content in News on Andrea Mauri

item.title: Going to WWW!
item.description: Form the 23th to the 28th of April I’ll be at the Web Conference (WWW) held in Lyon. I’ll be presenting the demo Social Smart Meter: Identifying Energy Consumption Behavior in User-Generated Content, which aim to investigate to which extent social media can be used as complementary source of information about individual energy consumption behavior.

item.title: Going to ISWC!
item.description: Form the 20th to the 26th of October I’ll be at the International Semantic Web Conference held in Vienna. I’ll be presenting the demo Stressless RSP Benchmarking with RSPLab, which will show how RSPLab enables design of experiments using a programmatic interface that allows deploying the environment, running experiments, measuring the performance, visualizing the results.
